name: Match X
description:
How To

Click with Left Mouse Button on the Pixels.

It has to be at least a pair of two same colors.

Clear as many pixels as you can.

Reset Current Level - R

Back to Menu - Click on the Top Info Bar

Menu from left to right.

Level Play Time, (Un)Mute Sound, Pixels Left, Clicks used

 


Story Mode: 15 Levels with beautiful Pixel Art. 

Next level can be reached when less than 4 pixel left.

Survival Mode: Is a Random generated field without guarantee that it is solvable.

Credits
